title: Toothpaste ingredient could fight malaria, research shows
text:
Toothpaste ingredient could fight malaria, research shows 3:55pm GMT - 01:13 
Research carried out in part by an artificially-intelligent (AI) 'robot scientist' has found that a common ingredient of toothpaste could be developed to fight drug-resistant strains of malaria. Scarlett Cvitanovich reports.   
Research carried out in part by an artificially-intelligent (AI) 'robot scientist' has found that a common ingredient of toothpaste could be developed to fight drug-resistant strains of malaria. Scarlett Cvitanovich reports.  //reut.rs/2mOfjgT
